title: Blood Rain
description: Ominous drumbeats that knife through the brain and the heart and reddish clouds that pour blood from the skies.Blood that isn’t just blood but so much more.Five people set out to unravel the terrifying secret of a remote West African island but none of them is prepared for what’s waiting for them.(This book contains violence and disturbing content of a sexual nature. Readers’ discretion is advised.)
author: Rajeev Singh
